trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Pasco
There were no other sightings in Pasco on or around July 1st 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was swimming in my cousins yard. That's when I heard a carnival ride noise and turned around, that's when I saw a big triangle shaped thing flying over my cousins neighbors house. I didn't know what the heck it was. It was a triangle shape. It had round edges and was flat on bottom and top. The object was making a whooshing noise and had red lights on each corner on the bottom. I can't remember if it had a white light in the middle, I think it did. It was moving very slowly and very close to the ground. I was shocked and excited. I called my cousin and we watched it together. It went behind and tree and we never saw it again.
Summary: triangle with round edges red lights on bottom of each edge
